text: Paul William Coteusis an electrical engineer at IBM's T.J. Watson Research Center in Yorktown Heights, New York. Coteus was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to packaging for high performance computing systems. ==References== Category:20th-century births Category:Living people Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Paul William Coteus
